description:
My place is close to Macy's, United Nations Headquarters, Grand Central, Empire State Building, 5th Ave. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Very cozy and clean home in Midtown East. It has a queen size bed with a very comfortable mattress,  full kitchen with cookware and utensils, AC unit.

Location is everything. Empire State Building, Rockefeller Center, United Nations, Times Sq, Central Park, Broadway Shows, Macy's, Bloomingdales, Shopping on 5th ave, Coffee shops, Greatest Restaurants, Bars to any taste, are within steps of walking.

The Metro train is 2 min walk by Grand Central station with multiple subway lines (4, 5, 6, S, 7) and the Metro North trains.

Guests will have - Internet, toiletries, linens/towels provided by the owner at the time of check-in.

Either I or my partner will be the main point of contact for any issues that may arise, and we are always reachable by phone, email, airbnb, SMS, viber - we always respond very quickly, usually within minutes.

No outside shoes allowed in the apartment.
Please treat home with respect as it is your own. 

When Checking out:
-make sure all the dishes are clean
-the garbage is taken out (outside the building on the right side behind the gate)
name: Central Beautiful Apartment
review: Everything was as mentioned in the description. I found location very convenient.
